Title: Predicting Faults from Cached History
Elements_risk_assessment:
use the annotation features of CVS and Subversion to
identify bug-introducing changes
UseOF-SZZ: Bug-introducing changes are identified at the file and entity level, using the approach in [22].
Summary: We analyze the version history of 7 software systems to predict the most fault prone entities and files.
Outcome: A FixCache model that predicts the faults with high accuracy:
